set.name: Soul Calibur III: Flash of Blades

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: When your opponent would add more than 1 card to their momentum in any phase of a turn, they only add 1 instead and they can no longer add cards to their momentum that phase. R Commit, discard 1 momentum: Before you make a control check to play an attack or action, that check gets +3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: The control check to play your next attack or action this turn gets +X. X equals your momentum minus your opponent's momentum (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets 'Stun: X'. X equals your opponent's momentum. Kilik R Commit, destroy this asset: After your opponent adds 1 or more cards to their momentum, they cannot add cards to their momentum until the beginning of their next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next control check to play an attack this turn gets +X. X equals your momentum minus your opponent's momentum (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards X of their momentum. X equals the amount that the control check to play this attack was modified by.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, either your opponent discards their entire momentum, or you add X cards from the top of your deck to your momentum (your choice). X equals your opponent's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Discard X momentum: Discard X of your opponent's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you make a control check to play an attack, that check gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you make a control check, give that check -X. If that check is successful, the next time you attempt to play an attack or action this turn, the control check to play it gets +X. X may not be greater than 5.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you partially block an attack, that attack deals no damage during its Damage Step. E Discard 1 card: Add 1 non-split action, non-split foundation, or character from your discard pile to your hand. If the added card does not have a block, discard your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, add 1 Reversal from your discard pile to your hand. Lizardman E: If this attack deals damage, add 1 Reversal from your discard pile to your hand (which is now eligible to be used as a Reversal)

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you attempt to play an attack as a Reversal after blocking with a non-attack, the attack you are attempting to play as a Reversal gets -2 difficulty. Lizardman E Destroy this asset: Add 1 non-attack block from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, add 1 non-attack block from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, any attacks that you block deal no damage during their Damage Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, add 2 non-attack blocks from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, add 1 non-attack block from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: When you would clear a Reversal from your card pool, add it to your hand instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you attempt to block an attack with a card from your hand, the difficulty needed to play that card as a block gets -3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack with 3 or less damage gets +2 damage. F Discard 2 momentum:If you have dealt damage to your opponent this turn, gain 3 vitality. If you no longer have any momentum, commit this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: If you have dealt damage to your opponent this turn, gain 5 vitality. Until the beginning of your next turn, your attacks get +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack with 3 or less printed damage gets +X damage. X equals that attack's printed damage. Mitsurugi E Destroy this asset: For the rest of the turn, your attacks get +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not blocked, gain X vitality. X equals this attack's damage minus your opponent's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, gain X vitality. X equals this attack's damage minus its speed (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: If you have dealt damage to your opponent this turn, whenever this attack gets a damage bonus, gain X vitality. X equals the damage bonus.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +1 damage. Gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack with 5 or less damage gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 2 momentum: After you take damage from your opponent's attack, gain X vitality. X equals half of the damage dealt (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals your attack's damage minus its speed (minimum 0). E Commit 1 foundation: If your attack deals damage, you may discard X cards to add that attack to your momentum. X equals that attack's control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add it to your momentum. Until the end of this turn, your attack's get +1 speed. If your character is Raphael, discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack has greater damage than speed, it gets +1 speed. Raphael F Commit: Until the end of this turn, your attacks get +1 speed.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack's speed becomes equal to the speed of any other attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: If this attack is not blocked, the next attack you play this turn gets +X speed. X equals that attack's damage minus its speed (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: If this attack deals damage, add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack has greater damage than speed, it gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 2 momentum: Add up to 2 cards from your card pool to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals your momentum minus your opponent's momentum (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Once per turn, add 1 card from your card pool to your hand. E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, add up to 2 cards from your momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If you block this attack, add this card and All of the cards played as blocks in your card pool to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, add 1 other card from your card pool to your hand. Seong Mi-Na F Destroy this asset: Add up to 2 attacks from your card pool to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 2 momentum: If this attack is not blocked, add it to yout hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack is not blocked, during the end of this turn when you would normally add it to your momentum, you may add it to your hand instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). Before you clear this card from your card pool, you may remove it from the game to add up to 2 cards from your momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, add 1 card from your momentum to your hand and 1 card from your card pool to your hand. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Add 1 card from your card pool to your hand. Then your Combat Phase ends.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Draw 1 card. If your opponent's character has a greater 'HT' than yours, draw 1 additional card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Until the beginning of your next turn, your attacks that share 2 or more resource symbols with your character get Reversal. E: Your attack with 4 or less speed gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack with a speed of 2 or less has its speed changed to X. X equals your hand size.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your Reversal with a speed of 4 or less gets +1 speed. Setsuka E Destroy this asset: If you attempt to plan ay attack as a Reversal after blocking this attack, you may commit cards in your momentum as well as foundations to make that check successful.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 speed. Only playable if you have given an attack a speed bonus this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is played as a Reversal, it is unblockable.

property.name: CardText
property.value: When you are attempting to play this attack as a Reversal, you may commit cards in your momentum as well as foundations to make the check successful.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack played as a Reversal gets +X speed. X equals that attack's speed (maximum 3).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block an attack, any attack in your hand that shares 2 or more resource symbols with the card you used to block may be played as a Reversal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, the next attack you play this turn with a speed of 3 or less gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you discard 1 or more of your momentum, your opponent discards X of their momentum. X equals half the amount of momentum you discarded (rounded up). E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals your momentum minus your opponent's momentum halved (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, your opponent discards X of their momentum. X equals their momentum minus your momentum (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play an attack during your turn, your opponent discards 1 of their momentum. Siegfried E Destroy this asset: If you have more momentum than your opponent, your attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 damage. Only playable if your opponent started this Combat Phase with more momentum than you.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the total of your momentum and your opponent's momentum halved (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: Your opponent discards All of their momentum. If completely blocked, this attack will no longer deal half damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 2 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals double the total of your momentum minus your opponent's momentum (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: When you discard cards from your momentum due to your opponent's card or ability, they discard the same number of cards from their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 2 foundations: Before a player makes a control check, that check gets -1. F Commit: Draw up to your hand size. Your Combat Phase ends.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit any number of foundations: Before your opponent makes a control check to play a card as a block, that check gets -X. X equals half of the number of foundations committed for this ability (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Draw X cards. X equals the amount of cards in your opponent's staging area minus the amount of cards in yours (minimum 0). Your Combat Phase ends. Sophitia E: If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card. If it is your turn, commit 2 cards in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Reduce this attack's damage by any amount (minimum 0): Either the next control check your opponent makes this turn gets -X, or your draw X cards. X eqauls half of the amount this attack's damage was reduced by (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, draw X cards and then your Combat Phase ends. X equals half of your hand size (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card is in your card pool after having been played as a block, before a player makes a control check, you may discard this card from your card pool and commit 1 foundation to give that control check -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit 2 foundations: Before a player makes a control check, that check gets -2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, draw X cards and then your Combat Phase ends. X equals your hand size.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit 1 foundation: Before a player makes a control check, that check gets -1. If that control check is successful, that player draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After your attack deals damage, draw 1 card and them commit 1 of your foundations. E Commit, discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, discard up to 3 cards from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, discard that attack and this card from your card pool and then draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Discard 1 card from your card pool. Taki E Destroy this asset: If your attack deals damage, add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, discard up to 1 other card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack is not blocked, discard it from your card pool once it is resolved. Only playable if you have not discarded any cards from your card pool this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you discard 1 or more cards from your card pool, each player draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Discard 1 card from your card pool. Only playable if you have drawn cards during this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Each player draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Either your high zone attack gets +1 speed, your mid zone attack gets +3 speed, or your low zone attack gets +2 speed. R Discard 1 momentum: After your opponent's attack gets a damage bonus, that attack gets -X damage. X equals the bonus given. If your opponent's character has greater 'HT' and 'WT' than yours, halve the damage of the attack instead (rounded uo).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, choose an attack zone. Until the end of this turn, attacks in the chosen attack zone get +2 speed. If your character is Talim and your attack deals damage, discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your high zone attack gets +3 speed. Talim First F Destroy this asset: If your opponent's character has a greater 'HT' than yours, attacks cannot get damage bonuses until the beginning of your next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). E: This attack gets +X speed. X equals the number of cards in your staging area with a block zone that matches the block zone of this attack. This attack will no longer deal half damage if completely blocked.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your opponent's character has a greater 'WT' than yours, then attacks cannot get damage bonuses while this card is in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, All damage bonuses are reduced by 1 until the beginning of your next turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack is returned to its printed damage. If your opponent's character has a greater 'HT' than yours, you do not need to block this attack to be able to play a Reversal to it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your opponent's character has greater 'HT' than yours, this attack may no longer get bonuses to its damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your attack with an attack zone that matches its own block zone gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit any combination of X foundations and/or momentum: When you are taking damage from your opponent's attack, reduce the amount taken by X doubled (minimum 1). R Commit, discard 2 cards: After your opponent plays an action, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard X momentum: When you are taking damage from your opponent's attack, reduce the amount taken by X doubled (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent's weapon attack gets -5 damage (minimum 1). Zasalamel R Destroy this card: After your opponent plays a response, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up). While this card is in your card pool, your opponent's attacks get -2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Whenever your opponent plays a response during this attack, it gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After your opponent plays a response, you may discard this card from your card pool to cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Discard 2 cards, destroy this foundation: Until the beginning of your next turn, responses cannot be played.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 card: After your opponent plays a response, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: When you take damage from this attack, reduce the amount taken by 4 (minimum 1).
